>That brings me to a point:  entrances to castles should be wide enough 
>that a thief can't anchor a couple of poison clouds to the sides and 
>taunt and take out all the opponents.

I think it's unreasonable to say "make entrances to castles too wide, so thieves can't use poison cloud + taunt as well.".. as that defiles the architecture of the castle and makes it less believable.. not to mention, it just doesn't work (surround yourself with a few poison clouds and taunt away.. it accomplishes the same task, effectively)

What should be done instead is revise poison clouds so that they drift a long distance before time runs out (does P.C. last longer if you're a high level, compared with a low level?)..

alternatively, you could reduce the taunt length and power...

.. at higher levels, the class powers quickly get out of hand.. but at low levels, this could easily increase the difficulty of the thief, if that's what you're aiming at.

btw, off-topic, but.. *poke* Tom, Seth, anyone from FSGames still around? Any chance of you guys releasing the gladiator source code? howabout just the v0.1 or v0.2 source? hmm? hmm?
